member.name: T:PiTop.Camera.HttpSnapshotCamera
member.summary: Follow instructions from https://github.com/jacksonliam/mjpg-streamer to compile and install mjpg-streamer. When the camera is connected, the stream is also viewable externally on port 8080 (barring any firewalls).

member.name: T:PiTop.Camera.StreamingCamera
member.summary: Follow instructions from https://github.com/jacksonliam/mjpg-streamer to compile and install mjpg-streamer. When the camera is connected, the stream is also viewable externally on port 8080 (barring any firewalls).
